alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Jackson and northeastern DeKalb Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hollywood to near Pisgah to near Section. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Henagar, Stevenson, Ider, Pisgah, Dutton, Martintown, Rosalie, Fabius and Higdon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Alabama.
